member.name: T:CMS.WebServices.IWorkflowDesignerService
member.summary: Workflow graph contract for purposes of JavaScript proxy object generation. Its name is same as the name of interface so if we used IGraphService only, we could access from JavaScript only one implementation. Eventually we want multiple graph implementations with different service implementations on a page.

member.name: T:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper
member.summary: Provides utility methods for REST.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.GetUrlPathAndQueryHash(System.String)
member.summary: Returns hash string to be used for given URL path and query instead of authentication.
member.param: URL absolute path and query for which to get the hash (resolved virtual path and query string originating from ).
member.remarks: The produced hash is invariant of the trailing slash and optional query string parameters offset and maxrecords.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.IsUrlPathAndQueryHashValid(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether hash computed for matches .
member.param: URL absolute path and query for which to compute the hash (resolved virtual path and query string originating from or of the request being validated).
Hash to perform the computed hash matching against.
member.returns: Return true if produces the same hash as prescribes. Otherwise returns false.
member.remarks: The produced hash is invariant of the trailing slash and optional query string parameters offset and maxrecords.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.TryParseRestUrlPath(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to parse an absolute URL of a REST service endpoint and splits the absolute path to absolute path prefix and relative REST path.
member.param: Absolute URL identifying REST service endpoint.
When this method returns, contains absolute path prefix of the absolute path (the path portion preceding '/rest'). Contains null if parsing fails.
When this method returns, contains relative path within the REST endpoint (e.g. '/rest/all'). Contains null if parsing fails.
member.returns: Returns true upon successful parsing, otherwise false.
member.example: Parses a URL in format http://example.com/web/virtual/path/rest/om.activitytype?format=xml to /web/virtual/path prefix and /rest/om.activitytype REST path.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.GetUrlPathAndQueryHashInternal(System.String)
member.summary: Returns hash string to be used for given URL path and query instead of authentication.
member.param: URL absolute path and query for which to get the hash (resolved virtual path and query string originating from ).
member.remarks: The produced hash is invariant of the trailing slash and optional query string parameters offset and maxrecords.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.NormalizeUrlPathTrailingSlash(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes URL by removing trailing slash from the end of the URL path. The URL must be normalized in order to be compatible with the way the represents path.
member.param: URL path and query to normalize.
member.returns: URL which does not contain a trailing slash.
member.remarks: Normalizes URL paths like /RESTService.svc/cms.query/?domain=mydomain to /RESTService.svc/cms.query?domain=mydomain by trimming the trailing path slash.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.IsUrlPathAndQueryHashValidInternal(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether hash computed for matches . Validates hash expiration query parameter hashExpirationUtc if provided.
member.param: URL absolute path and query for which to compute the hash (resolved virtual path and query string originating from or of the request being validated).
Hash to perform the computed hash matching against.
member.returns: Return true if produces the same hash as prescribes. Otherwise returns false.
member.remarks: The produced hash is invariant of the trailing slash and optional query string parameters offset and maxrecords.

member.name: M:CMS.WebServices.RESTServiceHelper.TryParseRestUrlPathInternal(System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Tries to parse an absolute URL of a REST service endpoint and splits the absolute path to absolute path prefix and relative REST path.
member.param: Absolute URL identifying REST service endpoint.
When this method returns, contains absolute path prefix of the absolute path (the path portion preceding '/rest'). Contains null if parsing fails.
When this method returns, contains relative path within the REST endpoint (e.g. '/rest/all'). Contains null if parsing fails.
member.returns: Returns true upon successful parsing, otherwise false.
member.example: Parses a URL in format http://example.com/web/virtual/path/rest/om.activitytype?format=xml to /web/virtual/path prefix and /rest/om.activitytype REST path.
